name: Medic Dash
description:
Medic Dash is a time and resource management game, where you play as a doctor with the task of saving dying patients by managing the limited blood bags available to you.

Made in Copenhagen at Global Game Jam 2020 by:

  • Mathias Boldsen Jensen
  • Casper Simon Boonen
  • Magnus Eilersen
  • Oliver Jørgensen
  • Ida Lindballe Lønborg
